Text:
now why the fuck would you put a password on the archive ?!?
...

So you can make people go through one of those INCREDIBLY CHEESY marketing things (Get a free credit report!  Take an IQ test!  (Be forced to apply for 10 credit cards and a bogus travel scam before you can get through the thing!)) before they can OSTENSIBLY get the password.  

Don't bother trying to download this file.
